mapper.select: select logistics_id, waybill_id, staff_id, start_dot_id, target_dot_id, logistics_type, create_time from speedlogisticsdb.t_logistics where logistics_id = #{logisticsId}
select logistics_id, waybill_id, staff_id, start_dot_id, target_dot_id, logistics_type, create_time from speedlogisticsdb.t_logistics limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into speedlogisticsdb.t_logistics(waybill_id, staff_id, start_dot_id, target_dot_id, logistics_type) values (#{waybillId}, #{staffId}, #{startDotId}, #{targetDotId}, #{logisticsType})
mapper.update:
update speedlogisticsdb.t_logistics
waybill_id = #{waybillId},
staff_id = #{staffId},
start_dot_id = #{startDotId},
target_dot_id = #{targetDotId},
logistics_type = #{logisticsType},
create_time = #{createTime},

mapper.select: SELECT MAX(CASE d.`dot_id` WHEN l.`start_dot_id` THEN d.`dot_name` ELSE NULL END) startDotName, MAX(CASE d.`dot_id` WHEN l.`target_dot_id` THEN d.`dot_name` ELSE NULL END) targetDotName, l.`logistics_type` logisticsType,l.`create_time` createTime FROM `t_waybill` w,`t_logistics` l,`t_dot` d WHERE l.`waybill_id` = w.`waybill_id` AND (l.`start_dot_id` = d.`dot_id` OR l.`target_dot_id` = d.`dot_id`) AND w.`waybill_id` = #{waybillId} GROUP BY l.`logistics_id`
